stone.io

Class OutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FileOutputStream
        • stone.io.OutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class OutputStream
extends java.io.FileOutputStream
    A FileOutputStream allowing 2 or more Threads to work on by buffering write access of one
    Author:
    Nelphindal

    • Constructor Detail

      • OutputStream

        public OutputStream(java.io.File file,
                    java.nio.charset.Charset cs)
             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Opens a new OutputStream to a file. Pre-existing content of the file is discarded.
        Parameters:
        file - File to write into
        cs - encoding to use
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file exists and is no regular file

      • OutputStream

        public OutputStream(java.io.File file,
                    java.nio.charset.Charset cs,
                    boolean append)
             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Opens a new OutputStream to a file.
        Parameters:
        file - File to write into
        cs - encoding to use
        append - true if written bytes shall be appended and pre-existing content preserved
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if file exists and is no regular file
